name: Plexyfin Plugin Repository
description: Repository for the Plexyfin plugin that syncs collections from Plex to Jellyfin

plugins.name: Plexyfin
plugins.description: Sync collections and artwork from Plex to Jellyfin
plugins.overview: A plugin that synchronizes collections and artwork from your Plex Media Server to Jellyfin

versions.changelog: Improved collection sync, functional watch state sync, dry run capabilities.
